ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Prasantha Sarvadevabatla has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 11 years. Currently this candidate is employed at Experian. Prasantha has extensive knowledge of Microsoft ASP.NET, Microsoft C-SHARP, Microsoft .NET Technology, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Visual Basic .NET, JavaScript, Stored Procedures, XML, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Web Services, Visual Basic, UML/OMT, Seagate Crystal Reports, SQL Server Integration Services, Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Active Server Pages, SQL, Microsoft Excel, MVC, AJAX, Windows Communiciation Foundation, Oracle, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Microsoft SQL Server, HTML, HP Quality Center, Data Transformation Services, ADO, WinForms, Standard Reports, Quality Control, Quality Assurance, Oracle 9i, Microsoft Visual Studio, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft Access, MS Visual SourceSafe, GUI Applications, Client/Server, Cascading Style Sheets, CSLA .NET, VisiFire, Views, VSS, Shared Server Folders, Share Point Server 2007, SQL Server Reporting Services, Remedy, Relational Database, Oracle PL/SQL, Microsoft Project, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, Mapics, MS Access VBA, Java, Framework, ETL, Data Migration, Cursors, Control-M, Classic ASP, Citrix Winframe, Business Objects, Adobe Dimensions, Activity Diagrams. Prasantha has some experience in managment (11 months).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2012-03 for 11 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a IT Vended Apps Technical lead/.Net Contractor at Mayo Clinic.
